Communication is key. Both are at fault here. MC didn't have enough courage (fear of rejection/embarrassment), girl misunderstood MC based on a strange conversation, and both failed to find that intimate connection that could lead them together as a couple. And this is just puppy love. I'm sure you guys even heard of stories in real life that even some married couples seek divorce simply because their feelings changed and their love just plateau'd; really, it's no mystery, they just never realized that connection never existed, couldn't differentiate certain things. Aight, I'll stop here. Tl;dr = lack of connection, their love is not strong enough to care for each other to break barriers, if you can't talk, then no love. Done.

Since the 寝取られ (Netorare) is past form of 寝取る (Netoru) that translate in English as   'to have sex with (someone else's spouse or lover); to be in cahoots with (an adulterous, cuckolding or cheating person)'  The word cahoot noun means '(uncommon) A group of people working together (usually for an illicit purpose)' in this sexual intercourse situation like this.  Thus if I didn't too bad at translation, actual Japanese people perspective when read the word in Japanese alphabets would be like 'One's lover was stole to sleep with someone' by the words.  For more proper translation please study with Translate.google.com + https://en.wiktionary.org/ , typing any alphabets --> you'll see the translation in other languages but English too

@RubenBlades69 You don't seem like you've dated women. LOL. They also have the initiative when a man interests them. This happens when they reach a certain age: from adolescence onwards. It is true that in most cases the man accepts the active role to create <romantic atmosphere> but this is fed back with the clues that the woman gives (and where friends help). Also, the <flirting> process is an event that commonly occurs quickly since in most cases those involved are people who barely know each other. It only takes a couple of years to know if the relationship will result in a courtship or a friendship. It is not something that lasts for years. The story of this author is somewhat idealistic : it is too long the time where he likes the girl. I'm not saying it can't happen, but at that age you can like several girls at the same time. Feelings at this age are highly variable. That's why I have a hard time taking this story as an IRL example, like some idiots afflicted by this H.

For people who say this can happen in real life: it is possible, but it WOULD BE VERY RARE. Here as always, hentai resorts to idealizing things. On the contrary, generally IRL two people who like each other, and whose feelings  intensifying with the passage of a couple of years, will end up advancing in their relationship. And if this does not happen, then IT WILL BE BECAUSE BOTH ALREADY LEFT THOSE FEELINGS aside. Not at the same time, but it happens and easily. To say that a girl or boy will continue to <like> someone for so long (WITHOUT THEM LIKING ANOTHER PERSON) is to idealize it. Hentai breaks that idealization regarding the girl, but not regarding the boy. I have had friends (and personally I include myself) who have liked girls who later were in relationships with other guys. But (in our case) she was not the only girl we liked, nor did we like her for that long. LOL. Therefore, the boy's part is idealistic. That's what takes away from it realism.
